MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in   LL23 postcode area of Bala, affecting properties in Gwern Y Lon and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:05pm. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 11:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:55PM on 10th March 2021
